allow: Bash(for f in addReaction archiveChannel cancelScheduledMessage deleteMessage getChannelInfo getThreadMessages joinChannel leaveChannel listScheduledMessages pinMessage postInteractiveBlocks removeReaction renameChannel scheduleMessage setChannelPurpose setChannelTopic unpinMessage updateMessage)

Bash(psql "postgresql://postgres.xzwsdwllmrnrgbltibxt:Lukelombardo10!@aws-0-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:6543/postgres" -c "SELECT id, provider, status, created_at, expires_at, consecutive_failures, disconnect_reason FROM integrations WHERE provider IN (''gmail'', ''google-analytics'') ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash(for provider in airtable blackbaud dropbox facebook gumroad instagram kit linkedin notion onenote paypal shopify teams trello twitter)

Bash(psql "postgresql://postgres.xzwsdwllmrnrgbltibxt:Lukelombardo10!@aws-0-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:6543/postgres" -c "SELECT id, provider, status, access_token IS NOT NULL as has_token, refresh_token IS NOT NULL as has_refresh, created_at, expires_at FROM integrations WHERE provider ILIKE ''%google%calendar%'' OR provider = ''google'' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;")
